# Joel Lopez Personal Website - Deployment Package

This folder contains the production-ready files for GitHub Pages deployment.

## Files
- index.html - Main HTML file
- styles.css - All CSS styles
- script.js - All JavaScript functionality

## Deployment
These files can be deployed to GitHub Pages by:
1. Pushing this folder's contents to the root of the gh-pages branch, OR
2. Configuring GitHub Pages to use the /dist folder, OR
3. Using the deploy script: ./scripts/deploy

For more information, see the main README.md in the project root.
